column1: Uchi////Originally based in Austin and headed by head chef Tyson Cole
column2: Uchi continuously garners high praise for its innovative
column3: yet simplistic dishes. Now if you consider yourself a sushi sensei of any sort
column4: you would know better than to order one of those overworked rolls with every ingredient imaginable
column7: and dunked in a pool of soy sauce. Uchi however
column8: will offer you that untraditional twist without muddling your taste buds with excessiveness. The restaurant's philosophy is about upholding impeccable balance between various flavor profiles while keeping many of the ingredients simple and pure. Unlike other fine dining experiences
column9: these dishes are meant to make sense and not keep you guessing.
